newsitem.title: JAPAN: Taikan to take over Nikkodo karaoke units.
newsitem.headline: Taikan to take over Nikkodo karaoke units.

text.p: Japan's Taikan Co Ltd said on Friday it would take over 1.2 billion yen worth of Nikkodo Co Ltd's fixed property following their alliance in businesses related to karaoke music equipment.
The fixed property consists of Nikkodo's karaoke equipment and related products for rental purposes, Taikan said in a statement.
Taikan said it will announce in the near future the impact the takeover would have on its business results.
Earlier this month, Nikkodo announced the two firms had formed a partnership to share their resources and cooperate in the increasingly competitive karaoke industry.
